    This class handles all the logic for the initial login screen
    Main  
    MainFormController
    Main form controller, this is the main menu screen logic In the populatetables() method I use multiple lambda expressions I use lambda expression here to fill the columns of each table.
    ModifyAppointmentFormController
    This class handles all the logic for adding a new appointment
    ModifyCustomerFormController
    This class handles all the logic for modifying a customer
    TimeKeeper
    Class for handling all time conversions and time related things
    TimeSlot
    Class created to hold a twelve hour time as a string and its corresponding military time to use for calculations
